content.overview: Bihar me zameen naap ke liye Kattha aur Dhur ka istemal hota hai. 1 Kattha = 20 Dhur hota hai. Ye system khas kar rural Bihar me revenue record aur registry ke liye use hota hai.
step_by_step: Sabse pehle zameen ki lambai aur chaudai naap li jaati hai
Total area square feet ya meter me nikala jaata hai
Uske baad usse Kattha aur Dhur me convert kiya jaata hai
common_mistakes: Dusre rajya ka land unit Bihar par apply kar dena
Registry aur revenue record me unit mismatch
content.legal_notes: Registry aur mutation ke time Circle Office ke record ke hisab se unit maana jaata hai.
content.practical_tips: Naapi ke waqt hamesha Amin ya Revenue Karamchari ko involve karein.

content.overview: Zameen ka batwara tab hota hai jab joint khata ya sanyukt zameen ko alag-alag hisson me baanta jaata hai. Bihar me batwara Revenue Rules ke tahat hota hai.
step_by_step: Batwara ke liye Circle Office me application dena
Amin dwara naapi aur batwara naksha banana
common_mistakes: Sabhi hissedaron ko notice na dena
content.legal_notes: Vivadh hone par Civil Court ka decision maany hota hai.
content.practical_tips: Likhat batwara hamesha registry ya court order se karein.
